records.location_details: The incident occurred close to the Albania-Montenegro border, approximately one kilometer from the border, in a specific area in North-western Albania, near the Albania-Montenegro railway line. This location is identified as a possible crossing point for irregular immigrants and is occasionally patrolled by border police.
